column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I ordered a beef empenada with a perfectly buttery
column2: crisp pastry crust; the filling was a touch spicy
column3: but pleasantly so. I also had the cjphicken and chorizo skewer. It was juicy
column4: well-seasoned and garnished well. The presentation of all plates was artfully done and while small in size
